entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:25 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 08:40 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 4.
